TextView.android:text: Thank you for participating in the event. We would like to know your experiences with volunteering. Please spare some time to give us valuable feedback to improve our management of the event.
Have you volunteered in similar events before?
Was your role and responsibility as a volunteer clearly explained?
Were the materials and resources provided adequate for your tasks?
How satisfied are you with your volunteer experience?
Did you feel that your contributions were valued?
Do you think the event was beneficial to the barangay community?
Did the community members actively participate in the project?
Did you face any challenges during the event?
What aspects of the event could be improved?
Would you be willing to volunteer again in the future events? Why or why not?
